query.queryinfo: select [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' and (([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' and [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] contains '[HSW-uWS-CT]') or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\uInnovation' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\MCSF1' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\CT\For HSW' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\MCSF' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU' or [System.NodeName] = 'Report') and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_R2]' and [System.NodeName] in ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom') and [System.State] in ('New', 'Assigned') and ([UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today or [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] > '2021-04-26T00:00:00.0000000') order by [System.State], [System.NodeName]

select [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.NodeName], [UI.Reserved], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.bug.keyword], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' and (([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' and [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] contains '[HSW-uWS-CT]') or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\uInnovation' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\MCSF1' or [System.NodeName] = 'Report') and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Design' and [System.NodeName] in ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D') and [System.Title] contains 'Design_Func' and [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69_SP4]' and [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[69SP4H3增量]' and [System.State] in ('New', 'Assigned') and ([UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] < @today or [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate] > '2021-06-12T00:00:00.0000000') order by [System.State], [System.NodeName], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority]

select [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.NodeName], [UI.Reserved], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.bug.keyword], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] from WorkItems where [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' and (([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' and [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] contains '[HSW-uWS-CT]') or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\uInnovation' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\MCSF1' or [System.NodeName] = 'Report') and [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Design' and [System.NodeName] in ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D') and [System.Title] contains 'Design_Func' and [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69_SP4]' and [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[69SP4H3增量]' and [System.State] in ('Resolved', 'Verified', 'Closed') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] >= @today order by [System.State], [System.NodeName], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority]
